name: Small Health Potion
description: A basic healing potion that restores 25 health points instantly.

name: Medium Health Potion
description: A moderate healing potion that restores 50 health points instantly.

name: Large Health Potion
description: A powerful healing potion that restores 100 health points instantly.

name: Regeneration Elixir
description: A magical elixir that heals 75 health points.

name: Phoenix Feather
description: A legendary phoenix feather that completely restores health instantly.

name: First Aid Kit
description: A reusable first aid kit that heals 30 health points.
